description: This file sets up an agent for image generation using OpenAI's GPT-4 model, integrates it with a WhatsApp API, and runs a web server to serve the application.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: WhatsappAPI
classes.description: Provides WhatsApp API integration for the application.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: OpenAITools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with OpenAI models, such as image generation.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance from the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to serve the application.
